title: France panorama. [No. 75/03]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Horse - horse show and competition. 2. Stocking gas - natural gas reserves in France. 3. Wealth of the provinces - the Chateau de Boussac. 4. The arts: The dance - Roland Petit and the Marseille Ballet Troupe. A great collection - the Peggy Guggenheim Collection in Paris.
